mapper.sql: hdr.ITS_NBR as "ptntItsNbr", hdr.ARZI_ID as "arzi_id", hdr.PROC_ID as "procedureId", hdr.ARZI_TYP_ID as "arziTypeId", hdr.BDY_PRT_ID as "bodyPartId", hdr.COND_ID as "conditionId", hdr.OTHR_COND as "otherCond", hdr.OTHR_PROC as "otherProc", hdr.OTHR_BDY_PRT as "otherBdyPrt", hdr.ARZI_SMRY as "arziSummary", hdr.DR_CNSLT_NOTE as "drConsultNote", hdr.PRMY_ADDR_IND as "primaryAddrInd", hdr.ADDR_LN_1 as "addressLn1", hdr.ADDR_LN_2 as "addressLn2", hdr.PHN_NBR as "phoneNum", hdr.LOC_ID as "locationId", hdr.ZIP_CD as "zipCd", hdr.ACTV_IND as "activeInd", hdr.COND_STRT_DT_ID as "condStartDtId", hdr.CURR_STATUS_ID as "currentStatusId", hdr.CURR_STATUS_DT_ID as "currStatusDtId", hdr.RQST_SMT_DT_ID as "requestSubmitDtId", hdr.CREATE_USR_ID as "hdrCreateUserId", hdr.CREATE_TS as "hdrCreateTS", hdr.LST_UPDT_USR_ID as "hdrLastUpdUserId", hdr.LST_UPDT_TS as "hdrLastUpdTS", dtl.RVWR_ITS_NBR as "reviewerItsNbr", dtl.STATUS_ID as "dtlStatusId", dtl.STATUS_CHG_DT_ID as "statusChangeDtId", dtl.RVW_DT_ID as "reviewDtId", dtl.CREATE_USR_ID as "dtlCreateUserId", dtl.CREATE_TS as "dtlCreateTS", dtl.LST_UPDT_USR_ID as "dtlLastUpdUserId", dtl.LST_UPDT_TS as "dtlLastUpdTS", (SELECT PROC_NM FROM D_PROC WHERE PROC_ID = hdr.PROC_ID) AS "procedureName", (SELECT PROC_PRFX_CD FROM D_PROC WHERE PROC_ID = hdr.PROC_ID) AS "procedurePrefixCd", (SELECT COND_NM FROM D_COND WHERE COND_ID = hdr.COND_ID) AS "conditionName", (SELECT COND_PRFX_CD FROM D_COND WHERE COND_ID = hdr.COND_ID) AS "conditionPrefixCd", (SELECT BDY_PRT_NM FROM D_BDY_PRT WHERE BDY_PRT_ID = hdr.BDY_PRT_ID) AS "bodyPartName", (SELECT BDY_PRT_PRFX_CD FROM D_BDY_PRT WHERE BDY_PRT_ID = hdr.BDY_PRT_ID) AS "bodyPartPrefixCd", (SELECT ARZI_TYP FROM D_ARZI_TYP WHERE ARZI_TYP_ID = hdr.ARZI_TYP_ID) AS "arziTypeName", (SELECT STATUS_DESC FROM D_STATUS WHERE STATUS_ID = hdr.CURR_STATUS_ID) AS "currentStatusDesc", (SELECT STATUS_DESC FROM D_STATUS WHERE STATUS_ID = dtl.STATUS_ID) AS "dtlStatusDesc"

cmnt.ARZI_ID as "cmntArziId", cmnt.CMNTR_ITS_NBR as "cmntrItsNbr", cmnt.CMNT_DT_ID as "cmntDateId", cmnt.CMNT_TS as "cmntTs", cmnt.CMNT_TXT as "cmntText", cmnt.CREATE_USR_ID as "cmntCreateUserId", cmnt.CREATE_TS as "cmntCreateTS", cmnt.LST_UPDT_USR_ID as "cmntLastUpdUserId", cmnt.LST_UPDT_TS as "cmntLastUpdTS"
mapper.select:
select
from F_ARZI_HDR hdr left join F_ARZI_DTL dtl on hdr.ARZI_ID = dtl.ARZI_ID where hdr.ITS_NBR = #{itsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hdr.ACTV_IND = 'Y'

select
from F_ARZI_HDR hdr left join F_ARZI_DTL dtl on hdr.ARZI_ID = dtl.ARZI_ID where hdr.ARZI_ID = #{arziId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hdr.ITS_NBR = #{itsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from F_ARZI_HDR hdr left join F_ARZI_DTL dtl on hdr.ARZI_ID = dtl.ARZI_ID where hdr.ARZI_ID = #{arziId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select ptnt.PTNT_ITS_NBR as "ptntItsNbr", hdr.ARZI_ID as "arziId" from F_ARZI_HDR hdr join D_PTNT ptnt on ptnt.PTNT_ITS_NBR = hdr.ITS_NBR left join F_ARZI_DTL dtl on hdr.ARZI_ID = dtl.ARZI_ID
order by ptnt.LAST_NM, ptnt.FIRST_NM, hdr.ARZI_ID

select ptnt.PTNT_ITS_NBR as "ptntItsNbr", hdr.ARZI_ID as "arziId" from F_ARZI_HDR hdr join D_PTNT ptnt on ptnt.PTNT_ITS_NBR = hdr.ITS_NBR left join F_ARZI_DTL dtl on hdr.ARZI_ID = dtl.ARZI_ID where dtl.RVWR_ITS_NBR = #{reviewerItsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} and dtl.STATUS_ID = 1002 and hdr.CURR_STATUS_ID = 1002

select
from F_ARZI_CMNT cmnt where cmnt.ARZI_ID = #{arziId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from F_ARZI_CMNT cmnt where cmnt.CMNT_TS = #{commentTimestamp,jdbcType=DATE}
mapper.insert:
insert into F_ARZI_HDR ( ITS_NBR, PROC_ID, ARZI_TYP_ID, BDY_PRT_ID, COND_ID, OTHR_COND, OTHR_PROC, OTHR_BDY_PRT, COND_STRT_DT_ID, ARZI_SMRY, PRMY_ADDR_IND, ADDR_LN_1, ADDR_LN_2, LOC_ID, ZIP_CD, PHN_NBR, CREATE_USR_ID, CREATE_TS, LST_UPDT_USR_ID, LST_UPDT_TS, RQST_SMT_DT_ID, CURR_STATUS_ID, CURR_STATUS_DT_ID ) values ( #{itsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{procedure.procedureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arziType.arziTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bodyPart.bodyPartId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{condition.conditionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{otherCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherProcedure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherBodyPart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{conditionStartDate.gregorianDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arziSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{primaryAddrInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=BOOLEAN}, #{ptntHomeAddress1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptntHomeAddress2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptntLocation.locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ptntZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptntPhoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{itsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{requestSubmitDate.gregorianDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentStatus.statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentStatusDate.gregorianDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

insert into F_ARZI_DTL ( ARZI_ID, STATUS_ID, STATUS_CHG_DT_ID, RVWR_ITS_NBR, RVW_DT_ID, CREATE_USR_ID, CREATE_TS, LST_UPDT_USR_ID, LST_UPDT_TS ) values ( #{arziId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status.statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusChangeDate.gregorianDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reviewerItsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reviewDate.gregorianDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{itsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now() )

insert into F_ARZI_CMNT ( ARZI_ID, CMNTR_ITS_NBR, CMNT_DT_ID, CMNT_TS, CMNT_TXT, CREATE_USR_ID, CREATE_TS, LST_UPDT_USR_ID, LST_UPDT_TS ) values ( #{arziId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentorItsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentDate.gregorianDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commentText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentorItsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{commentorItsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now() )
mapper.update:
update F_ARZI_HDR
ARZI_TYP_ID = #{arziType.arziTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BDY_PRT_ID = #{bodyPart.bodyPartId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COND_ID = #{condition.conditionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OTHR_COND = #{otherCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHR_PROC = #{otherProcedure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHR_BDY_PRT = #{otherBodyPart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARZI_SMRY = #{arziSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COND_STRT_DT_ID = (select DT_ID from D_DATE where CAL_DT = #{conditionStartDate.gregorianCalDate,jdbcType=DATE}),
PROC_ID = #{procedure.procedureId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DR_CNSLT_NOTE = #{doctorConsultNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURR_STATUS_ID = #{currentStatus.statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRMY_ADDR_IND = #{primaryAddrInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=BOOLEAN},
ADDR_LN_1 = #{ptntHomeAddress1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDR_LN_2 = #{ptntHomeAddress2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHN_NBR = #{ptntPhoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOC_ID = #{ptntLocation.locationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CD = #{ptntZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_UPDT_USR_ID = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_UPDT_TS = now() where ARZI_ID = #{arziId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update F_ARZI_HDR set ACTV_IND = 'N' where ARZI_ID = #{arziId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update F_ARZI_HDR
CURR_STATUS_ID = #{currentStatus.statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CURR_STATUS_DT_ID = (select DT_ID from D_DATE where CAL_DT = #{currentStatusDate.gregorianCalDate,jdbcType=DATE}),
LST_UPDT_USR_ID = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LST_UPDT_TS = now() where ARZI_ID = #{arziId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
